description: Configuration for mirroring vendor model artifacts (checkpoints/configs/etc.) onto GitHub Releases so the registry can point at stable, public direct-download URLs.

filename_policy.notes: Keep filenames stable across releases. Prefer deterministic names based on model_id so registry URLs don't depend on upstream naming conventions.

direct_download_expectations: Do not use gated Hugging Face URLs in registry unless you also support tokens at runtime
Prefer mirroring any 401/403 (gated) or unstable upstream links

notes: This file is configuration only; it does not itself upload assets. Upload the mirrored files as release assets under the configured tag, using the filenames implied by filename_policy.
After uploading assets, update the model registry to point links.* at the mirror base_url_template and ensure artifacts.*.filename matches the uploaded asset filenames.
